name: Melanin Production
description: Ability to produce and distribute melanin pigment in response to UV exposure

name: UV Sensitivity
description: Susceptibility to UV-induced damage and sunburn

name: Barrier Function
description: Skin's ability to retain moisture and protect against environmental stressors

name: Hydration Level
description: Moisture content in the stratum corneum

name: Inflammatory Response
description: Tendency to develop inflammatory reactions in the skin

name: Immune Activity
description: Immune system activity in the skin

name: Antioxidant Capacity
description: Ability to neutralize free radicals and oxidative stress
measurement_method: Free radical testing and antioxidant assays

name: DNA Repair Capacity
description: Efficiency of repairing UV-induced DNA damage
measurement_method: Comet assay and DNA damage markers

name: Vascular Reactivity
description: Blood vessel response to stimuli and tendency for flushing

name: Microcirculation
description: Quality of blood flow in small skin vessels

name: Sebum Production
description: Rate and quality of natural oil production

name: Product Sensitivity
description: Tendency to react to skincare ingredients
